tasks.label: Auto Test on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo +nightly watch -x "test --all-features" -w api/ -w core/ -w extensions/ -w tools/

tasks.label: Auto Coverage on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo install cargo-tarpaulin --quiet && cargo +nightly watch -x "tarpaulin --all-features --skip-clean --out Xml --out Html --engine llvm --target-dir target/coverage-build" -w api/ -w core/ -w extensions/ -w tools/

tasks.label: Generate Code Coverage
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-tarpaulin --quiet && cargo +nightly tarpaulin --all-features --out Xml --out Html --engine llvm --target-dir target/coverage-build

tasks.label: Big Endian Test Watch
tasks.command: cargo watch -w api/ -w core/ -w extensions/ -w tools/ -- cross +nightly test --all-features --target powerpc64-unknown-linux-gnu
